extDescription.message: 一个使用 ShortenMe API 的简单 URL 缩网址扩展功能。

pageTitle.description: Title format: app name - brief description

shortenUrlButton.message: 进行缩网址并复制到剪贴板
shortenUrlButton.description: Button text for shortening the URL and copying to clipboard

shortenedUrlCopied.description: Button text after a URL has been successfully copied

failedCopyToClipboard.message: 无法将缩网址 URL 复制到剪贴板。
failedCopyToClipboard.description: Error message when clipboard write fails

unexpectedError.description: Fallback error message for unknown failures

saveChangesButton.description: Text for save changes button in options

saveHistoryLabel.message: 将缩网址 URL 保存到历史记录

autoCreateLabel.message: 点击扩展功能时自动创建页面的缩网址 URL

clearAllHistoryButton.description: Text for clear all history button

noHistoryMessage.message: 目前尚无缩网址 URL 历史记录

confirmClearHistory.message: 您确定要清除所有历史记录吗？

themeOptionSystem.description: Option label for system theme mode

themeOptionLight.description: Option label for light theme mode

themeOptionDark.description: Option label for dark theme mode

onboardingThankyouMessage.description: Onboarding header thanking user for installing, $1 is app name

onboardingWelcomeMessage.message: $1 让分享链接变得简单！
onboardingWelcomeMessage.description: Welcome message on onboarding page, $1 is app name

onboardingQuickGuideMessage.message: 查看下面的快速教程以开始使用
onboardingQuickGuideMessage.description: Intro to quick guide on onboarding

onboardingPinExtensionMessage.message: 将 $1 固定到工具栏，方便快速使用
onboardingPinExtensionMessage.description: Instruction to pin the extension, $1 is app name

onboardingClickToShortenTitle.description: Title for click to shorten step

onboardingClickToShortenMessage.message: 只需点击图标即可立刻使用缩网址！

onboardingRightClickShorteningMessage.message: 右键点击页面上的任何链接或文字以立即产生缩网址。

onboardingViewHistoryMessage.message: 历史记录让您随时查看过去的缩网址

onboardingAdjustThemeMessage.message: 您可以通过设置自定义 $1 主题颜色
onboardingAdjustThemeMessage.description: Instruction to adjust theme, $1 is app name

onboardingAllSetMessage.message: 关闭此页，开始享受 $1 带来的便利吧！
onboardingAllSetMessage.description: Final message on onboarding page, $1 is app name

contextMenuShortenLinkTitle.message: 缩短链接并复制到剪贴板
contextMenuShortenLinkTitle.description: Context menu title for link shortening

contextMenuShortenSelectedTextTitle.message: 缩短选取的文字并复制到剪贴板
contextMenuShortenSelectedTextTitle.description: Context menu title for selected text shortening

contextMenuShortenPageLinkTitle.message: 缩短页面链接并复制到剪贴板
contextMenuShortenPageLinkTitle.description: Context menu title for page link shortening

invalidUrlError.message: 此 URL 无效。请尝试其他 URL
invalidUrlError.description: Error message when user inputs an invalid URL

noTextSelected.description: Error shown when user tries to shorten without selecting text
